title: Error: cannot use theGoos as type string in const initializer
body:
by **cornelius.howl**: 
I am trying to build go package with another ARCH parameter (goweb framework):

GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -x -o goweb-64

it shows:

WORK=/var/folders/j7/xdvdxd1s7w3gv8ztrp3qnj_r0000gn/T/go-build917996429
mkdir -p $WORK/runtime/_obj/
cd /usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime
/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6g -o $WORK/runtime/_obj/_go_.6 -p runtime -+ -D
_/usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime -I $WORK ./compiler.go ./debug.go ./error.go ./extern.go
./mem.go ./softfloat64.go ./type.go ./zgoarch_amd64.go ./zversion.go
# runtime
/usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/extern.go:137: undefined: theGoos
/usr/local/go/src/pkg/runtime/extern.go:137: cannot use theGoos as type string in const
initializer
